vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
συλλᾰλ-έω,
talk with or together, τινι [NT+3rd c.BC+]; ὑπὲρ τοῦ ἐνδοῦναι [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to talk with, discuss with, confer with
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to talk with, discuss with, confer with
to talk, converse, confer or discuss with, Mt. 17:3; Mk. 9:4; Lk. 4:36; 9:30; 22:4; Acts 25:12*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hablar o conversar con; consultar con
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: nói chuyện với; nói chuyện cùng nhau; thảo luận với; bàn luận với. σύν (G4862) + λαλέω (G2980)
